short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean deleted, canceled and failed files from download history at the click of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple chrome extension to remove deleted and failed files from your download history at the click of a button.
The intuitive app shows a badge with the number of deleted and failed files that exist in your history so that you don't have to manually check. Just check the relevant boxes and click your way to a clean download history.
